body:
Comment 1: 
FTR, 
    IN_CLOSE                         = 0x18
    IN_CLOSE_NOWRITE                 = 0x10
    IN_CLOSE_WRITE                   = 0x8

what a strange setting.

btw, do we still want to retain the inotify package, i think we're now focusing
on the fsnotify package.
_Labels changed: added **release-none**, **repo-exp**._ _Status changed to **Accepted**._
